Emerging (1-40 pt): The Big Picture Issue is of minimal importance
Proficient (41-80 pts): The Big Picture Issue is Important but not clearly articulated
Mastery (81-120 pts): The Big Picture Issue is Important and clearly articulated

Emerging (1-40 pt): The specific problem is of minimal importance (globally, locally) and the relevance to the selected audience is unclear
Proficient (41-80 pts): The specific problem is of globally importance but local relevance is unclear
Mastery (81-120 pts): The specific problem is  of globally importance and the local relevance is clearly articulated

Emerging (1-40 pt): The solutions and/or benefits are poorly articulated
Proficient (41-80 pts): The solutions and/or benefits are stated for a general audience but not tardeted to the specific audience.
Mastery (81-120 pts): The potential solutions  and significance/benefit are clearly and concisely identified in a way that is relevant to the target audience.

Emerging (1-40 pt): The writing is grammatically incorrect or hard to read.
Proficient (41-80 pts): The language is correct but full of jargon that is difficult for the audience to read.
Mastery (81-120 pts): The writing is clear, geared to the appropriate audience, and concise.

Emerging (1-40 pt): The Message Box was not well-geared to the audience or the content was limited.
Proficient (41-80 pts): The  contents of the Message Box  were generally accurate but not compelling for the focal audience.
Mastery (81-120 pts): A specific audience was chosen, and the 5 components of the Message Box were geared to that audience. The information provide was accurate and clearly stated.

Emerging (1-40 pt): minimal effort and creativity,. Don't take advantage of the platform
Proficient (41-80 pts): platform specific content that with some additional effort could engage or even captivate audiences
Mastery (81-120 pts): content is creative, engaging, and likely to attract attention to the issues discussed.
